sen.j: 河瀬神社 (かわせじんじゃ)は滋賀県彦根市に鎮座する神社。
sen.e: Kawase-jinja Shrine is a Shinto shrine located in Hikone City, Shiga Prefecture.
Kawase-jinja Shrine is a Shinto shrine located in Hikone City, Shiga Prefecture.
Kawase-jinja Shrine is a Shinto shrine located in Hikone City, Shiga Prefecture.

sen.j: 『延喜式神名帳』には近江国神埼郡鎮座 川桁神社と記されている。
sen.e: This shrine is registered as Kawaketa-jinja Shrine in Kanzaki County, Omi Province on "Engishiki Shinmyo Cho" (list of shrines under the Engishiki [codes and procedures on national rites and prayers]).

This shrine is registered as Kawaketa-jinja Shrine in Kanzaki County, Omi Province on "Engishiki Shinmyo Cho" (list of shrines under the Engishiki [codes and procedures on national rites and prayers]).

This shrine is registered as Kawaketa-jinja Shrine in Kanzaki County, Omi Province on "Engishiki Shinmyo Cho" (list of shrines under the Engishiki [codes and procedures on national rites and prayers]).

sen.j: 江戸時代までは川桁神社と称され、明治以降河瀬神社と称されることになった。
sen.e: Referred to as Kawaketa-jinja Shrine until the Edo period, the shrine has been renamed Kawase-jinja Shrine since the Meiji period.
Referred to as Kawaketa-jinja Shrine until the Edo period, the shrine has been renamed Kawase-jinja Shrine since the Meiji period.
Referred to as Kawaketa-jinja Shrine until the Edo period, the shrine has been renamed Kawase-jinja Shrine since the Meiji period.

sen.j: 本殿は元治元年 (1864年)の造営で京都府京都市にある賀茂別雷神社の神殿を移築したものである。
sen.e: The shrine of Kamo-wakeikazuchi-jinja Shrine in Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, was ceremonially transferred to Hikone City in 1864 to be the Honden (main shrine) of Kawase-jinja Shrine.
The shrine of Kamo-wake-ikazuchi-jinja Shrine in Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, was ceremonially transferred to Hikone City in 1864 to be the Honden (main shrine) of Kawase-jinja Shrine.
sen.cmt: 賀茂別雷神社の表記を公式HPの記述に合わせました。http://www.kamigamojinja.jp/english/index-e.html
sen.e: The shrine of Kamo-wake-ikazuchi-jinja Shrine in Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, was ceremonially transferred to Hikone City in 1864 to be the Honden (main shrine) of Kawase-jinja Shrine.

sen.j: 商売の神様として古くから信仰を集めている。
sen.e: This shrine has been widely believed as the god of business since long ago.
This shrine has been widely believed as the god of business since long ago.
This shrine has been widely believed as the god of business since long ago.

sen.j: 馬頭人記念 種村源平碑
